description: Structured information on a bundle of file instances.
label: File bundle
name: FileBundle

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) of this file bundle.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma._instruction: Add the content type of this file bundle.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.label: Format
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.name: format

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/group._instruction: Add the concept which was used to group file instances into this file bundle.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/group.description: Reference to the aspect used to group something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/group.label: Grouped by
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/group.name: groupedBy

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file bundle.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.label: Hash
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.name: hash

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar._instruction: Add the file bundle or file repository this file bundle is a part of.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.label: Is part of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this file bundle.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora._instruction: Enter the storage size this file bundle allocates.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.label: Storage size
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora.name: storageSize
